nodes.text: Terence Dean "Terry" Brooks (born January 8, 1944) is a fantasy fiction writer and the author of the Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace novelization. He writes mainly epic fantasy, and has also written one movie novelization in addition to the The Phantom Menace. He has written 22 New York Times bestsellers during his writing career, and is considered to be the second-biggest selling living fantasy writer, behind J.K. Rowling.
